stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: SREday takes London by storm on September 14th-15th. Learn all about the latest SRE trends at this two-day gathering, featuring over 50+ talks. Early bird tickets are still available!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 SREday takes London by storm on September 14th-15th. Learn all about the latest SRE trends at this two-day gathering, featuring over 50+ talks. Early bird tickets are still available! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: ChatGPT Enterprise is here
stories.Description: In a bold move to appeal to businesses and scale its success, OpenAI has unveiled ChatGPT Enterprise—an enhanced, secure, and privacy-centered version of its viral chatbot.
stories.Tweet: ChatGPT Enterprise is here 📦 In a bold move to appeal to businesses and scale its success, OpenAI has unveiled ChatGPT Enterprise—an enhanced, secure, and privacy-centered version of its viral chatbot. #openai https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/08/the-new-spreadsheet-openai-introduces-chatgpt-enterprise-for-businesses/

stories.Title: Live from Google Cloud Next '23
stories.Description: Google's infusion of AI in all fields promises an exciting era for developers. The company's Duet AI is set to amplify coding skills and streamline project creation.
stories.Tweet: Live from Google Cloud Next '23 📦 Google's infusion of AI in all fields promises an exciting era for developers. The company's Duet AI is set to amplify coding skills and streamline project creation. #google https://www.zdnet.com/article/google-cloud-expands-developer-tools-and-data-analytics-capabilities-with-generative-ai/

stories.Title: A potential chatbot hub
stories.Description: Poe strives to become the preferred browser for exploring the ever-changing world of chatbots. Recent updates include a Mac app, multi-conversation support, and Llama 2 integration.
stories.Tweet: A potential chatbot hub 📦 Poe strives to become the preferred browser for exploring the ever-changing world of chatbots. Recent updates include a Mac app, multi-conversation support, and Llama 2 integration. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/28/23849161/poe-ai-chatbot-platform-mac-app-llama-2-enterprise-tier

stories.Title: Look for the watermark
stories.Description: DeepMind takes on the challenge of image verification in the AI era with SynthID. This experimental method invisibly labels AI-generated images.
stories.Tweet: Look for the watermark 📦 DeepMind takes on the challenge of image verification in the AI era with SynthID. This experimental method invisibly labels AI-generated images. #google https://www.axios.com/2023/08/29/google-watermark-ai-generated-images

stories.Title: Duet AI lands in Workspace too
stories.Description: Duet AI’s goal is to redefine productivity by integrating AI across Google's Workspace apps. Forget about the hassle of summarizing meetings or crafting long emails, and let AI do the work for you.
stories.Tweet: Duet AI lands in Workspace too 📦 Duet AI’s goal is to redefine productivity by integrating AI across Google's Workspace apps. Forget about the hassle of summarizing meetings or crafting long emails, and let AI do the work for you. #google https://www.zdnet.com/article/google-workspaces-ai-facelift-is-finally-here-meet-duet-ai-for-workspace/

stories.Title: Amazon expands its portfolio
stories.Description: Amazon has recently acquired Fig, a startup focused on CLI innovations. With more coding solutions added to the company's toolkit, its stance in the AI race holds promise.
stories.Tweet: Amazon expands its portfolio 📦 Amazon has recently acquired Fig, a startup focused on CLI innovations. With more coding solutions added to the company's toolkit, its stance in the AI race holds promise. #amazon https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/29/amazon-fig-command-line-terminal-generative-ai/

stories.Title: German Bionic’s robotic innovation
stories.Description: Apogee+ helps caregivers to lift, assist, and arrange patients comfortably, showcasing the potential of robotic exoskeletons to ease the demands faced by healthcare professionals.
stories.Tweet: German Bionic’s robotic innovation 📦 Apogee+ helps caregivers to lift, assist, and arrange patients comfortably, showcasing the potential of robotic exoskeletons to ease the demands faced by healthcare professionals. #robotics https://www.engadget.com/german-bionics-latest-exoskeleton-helps-healthcare-workers-lift-elderly-patients-130046538.html

stories.Title: Hyundai's alternative path
stories.Description: The automaker has announced plans to build its own ultra-fast EV charger, steering away from Tesla's Supercharger network.
stories.Tweet: Hyundai's alternative path 📦 The automaker has announced plans to build its own ultra-fast EV charger, steering away from Tesla's Supercharger network. #hyundai https://electrek.co/2023/08/28/hyundai-thinks-it-has-the-answer-to-teslas-supercharger-network/

stories.Title: Mercedes charges ahead
stories.Description: After unveiling plans for a global EV charging network earlier this year, Mercedes-Benz announced it would launch this October, starting in the US, China, and Germany.
stories.Tweet: Mercedes charges ahead 📦 After unveiling plans for a global EV charging network earlier this year, Mercedes-Benz announced it would launch this October, starting in the US, China, and Germany. #mercedesbenz https://electrek.co/2023/08/28/mercedes-benz-shares-progress-update-of-new-global-ev-charging-network/

stories.Title: Take the juice out of GitHub Projects
stories.Description: Loved by program managers, developers, and enterprises, it's the ultimate tool for seamless project management. These 10 expert tips will guide you in unlocking its full potential.

title: OpenAI unveils ChatGPT Enterprise, Google's AI infusion, DeepMind presents SynthID
description: This is going to be serious from now on! OpenAI has finally introduced ChatGPT Enterprise, an optimized version of the chatbot designed specifically to meet all business requirements. Google’s Next event featured several AI improvements across its products (surprised?). Lastly, AI-generated images may no longer fool us, as DeepMind’s SynthID aims to watermark them.
